com.esri.mo2.map.img
Interface ImageClass

All Superinterfaces:
Dataset, GeoDataset, MapDataset, Searchable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ImageCatalog, ImageServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseImageClassProxy, BaseImageDirectoryCatalog, BaseImageFile, BaseImageServer
public interface ImageClass
extends MapDataset

An ImageClass is a kind of MapDataset that obtains Image data from its datasource when it is searched. When a FeatureClass is searched, it returns a Cursor that contains Features. When an ImageClass is searched, it returns a Cursor that contains one or more Images. Note that there are no attributes normally attached to the Images returned by searching. However, different types of ImageClass can produce differing results within a search Cursor as follows:

  • a BaseImageFile will normally return a single Image that is effectively invariant across multiple searches
  • an ImageCatalog is likely to return more than one Image depending upon the number of Images that cover the specified search area, and
  • an ImageServer will normally return a single Image, but the Image will be different for each search, because the remote server will re-generate an Image with different resolution depending on the search area

See Also:
Image, FeatureClass
